A.I. Connect._current:
HOPT ACTIVATION
Reveal 1 Cyberse monster in your hand; apply this effect based on its Attribute, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except Cyberse monsters.
● DARK: Special Summon the revealed monster, and if you do, SEARCH 1 Level 4 or lower non-DARK Cyberse monster.
● Other: Shuffle the revealed monster into the Deck, and if you do, SEARCH 1 "@Ignister" monster with a different Attribute.

Backup @Ignister._current: If you control a Cyberse monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can SEARCH 1 DARK Cyberse monster except "Backup @Ignister", then DISCARD 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Backup @Ignister" once per turn.

Regenesis Commands._current:
HOPT ACTIVATION
Apply these effects to all cards your opponent controls in the same column as your "Regenesis" monsters.
● Face-up cards: NEGATE their effects.
● Face-down monsters: Cannot change their battle positions.
● Face-down Spells/Traps: Cannot be activated until the end of the next turn.

The Toil of the Normal._current:
HOPT ACTIVATION
Apply these effects in sequence, based on the number of Normal Monsters with different names in your GY (skip over any that do not apply).
● 1+: This turn, Normal Monsters you control gain 800 ATK.
● 2+: NEGATE the effects of 1 Effect Monster on the field, until the end of this turn.
● 3+: This turn, Normal Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects.
● 4+: Shuffle 1 Effect Monster on the field into the Deck.
● 5+: SEARCH 1 "The Toil of the Normal".
